news.title: Altman, Huang and the last-minute negotiations that sealed the $100 billion OpenAI-Nvidia deal
news.summary: The $100 billion deal between Nvidia and OpenAI was struck under the pressure of a looming deadline during President Trump's U.K. trip.

news.title: Crypto startup Zerohash raises $104 million from Morgan Stanley, SoFi, Apollo and others
news.summary: Zerohash is among a wave of firms taking advantage of the more favorable regulatory environment for cryptocurrencies under President Donald Trump. Zerohash says it is among the first of its kind in the U.S. to go public.

news.title: Amazon faces off against FTC over 'deceptive' Prime program
news.summary: The FTC complaint alleges Amazon "tricked and trapped" consumers into signing up for Prime. It says Amazon made it too complicated to cancel their membership.

news.title: Trump to meet top Democrats as their health care demands fuel government shutdown risk
news.summary: Sen. Chuck Schumer urges President Donald Trump to meet with congressional Democratic leaders to negotiate a way out of the government funding stalemate. Sen. Schumer: 'I think it's a good idea to talk to each other'

news.title: Chinese EV giant BYD says it has a backup plan if it's cut off from Nvidia chips
news.summary: BYD executive Stella Li said BYD has not been told to stop using any Nvidia products. BYD is a Chinese manufacturer that has been owned by Chinese tech giant Nvidia since 2008.

news.title: Nvidia’s OpenAI deal adds to a brewing concern. But will that actually hurt the stock?
news.summary: Analyst: Some investors are increasingly worried that Nvidia is investing in companies that then purchase its chips. But he also notes the demand landscape looks strong for now.

news.title: ‘I want to live in a place that I can enjoy’: I’m 69, single and get $3,000 in Social Security. Can I afford $2,000 rent?
news.summary: “With inheritance, I now have a little over $1 million in cash and investments,” he says. “I’m in a good place.”

news.title: Jimmy Kimmel supporters who pushed for Disney boycott take victory lap over his Tuesday return to ABC
news.summary: The Walt Disney Co. pulled Jimmy Kimmel’s show last week after pressure from the White House. The company decided to return the late-night host to the air on Monday.

news.title: I’m 67. My wife, 48, is financially illiterate. How do I teach her to manage our money? After all, I won’t be around forever.
news.summary: “I have $1.1 million in a traditional IRA and $250,000 in cash,” he says. “We have a 12-year-old daughter.”

news.title: This new fund backed by the legendary Bill Miller banks on a simple but winning formula
news.summary: Veteran money manager Joseph Shaposhnik has a plan to fix actively managed funds and a track record on delivery. He has been at the helm of FTSE 100 funds for more than 20 years.
